ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2002_01_10: Did you have a question for me? Ask away.
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Let’s see what
we can learn today!
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2101_01_10:
There’s something I want to give you. I think it’ll
come in handy.
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2101_02_10: I’d love to hear your thoughts after you test it out.
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
Oh, that’s right. I have a present for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
I’m sure you can put it to good use. Do you
like it?
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
I have something for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]—here, take this.
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
It’s an expression of my appreciation and support
for always working so hard.
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
Nothing makes me happier than watching my
younger peers and students grow.
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
What stories do you have for me today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I learn so much when I talk to you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Thank you! I’ll take good care of it.
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2301_01_10: Amazing! How’d you know I wanted this?
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Is there something you like that I could offer in
return?
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
Maybe this is a good stopping point. I had fun—
thank you!
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
I never get tired of talking to you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Let’s call it here. It’s better to save the fun for
later, right?
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
This place is so spacious and comfortable—I think
I’ll be able to get a lot of studying done here.
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
...I’m always thinking of things in terms of school
and studying, huh?
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
I should probably take my mind off teaching and
just take it easy.
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
I’m really grateful for the way being a teacher
keeps me busy.
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
I get to learn so many things and make new
discoveries by teaching. It’s a tough job, but
it’s fulfilling.
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
I’ll work hard so that I can spread the joys of
learning to as many people as possible!
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
Would my students feel closer to me if I treated
them like friends?
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
Or is it better to build trust by setting strict
boundaries between teacher and student?
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
Hmmm... Maybe I shouldn’t think about this in such
black-and-white terms.
ch0014_01_cheren_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
Maybe a relationship in which I alternate between
friend and educator is ideal—just like ours.
